website_summaries.verdict: Both students and professionals alike will appreciate the classic design of this helpful organizer.
pros: Includes a larger open bin for papers, files, and notebooks
4 easy access bins on top for smaller supplies and another bin for sticky notes
cons: Not great for buyers needing a filing system in their organizer

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive picturce
customer_reviews.text: Picture very deceptive! Very small. Cannot fit a notebook 8.5 x 11 in the back. Be sure to check measurements, as picture is seriously wrong! Over priced for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Black

customer_reviews.title: I wish this was a little wider
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a organizer which looks clean and stylish. This one is a good design, multiple compartments with slide out drawer for paper clips and erasers. Only one problem, I wish this was a little bigger. Letter size papers barely fit in a slot it's not easy to take them out or put hem in. , I would prefer to put more pens and pencils. Extra two inches would make this product really better. However if you have small desk space this would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mku

customer_reviews.title: Great little organizer
customer_reviews.text: The organizer arrived well packaged and was exactly as described. We are using this on our church's "Welcome Center" where visitors get information about our church. We have used the organizer to hold pamphlets, paper clips, pens, and note paper. It is small enough to fit nicely on the half-circular desk under the counter top, yet it's roomy enough to hold most of the items we had intended. I would recommend and we definitely would purchase this item again. If you're looking for something with lots of storage, this is probably not your item (check dimensions), but if you need something to tidy up a space, this works great.
customer_reviews.author: CodyLamm

customer_reviews.title: Great storage, holds an ample amount
customer_reviews.text: This is a product I would get for anyone needing quick supply storage for their office whether it be for home or work. I love the drawer that slides out and the amount of post-it notes it holds. There's plenty of room for all of my pens, permanent markers, highlighters, and scissors. My planner fits inside perfectly, and it actually comes in handy as a place to hold my phone as well if I don't want it sitting on my desk. It's solidly built and comes ready to use right out of the package as described. I'm eager to buy another for home, now that I've seen how it looks at my office.
customer_reviews.author: B. D.

customer_reviews.title: Time to grow up and organize my desk
customer_reviews.text: In the ongoing effort to organize my life I purchased the desk organizer and I must say it's pretty cool! It's mesh, so things can't hide from me, it has loads of compartments to put things in ( and if you don't remember where you put it, just look )! Also purchased the 3- tier stackable letter sorter: another very cool item! I bought 2 of them, so I got jiggy with them and stacked them 2 / 4, instead of the traditional 3/3. I like the versatility of them. As for shipment: they arrived before I was ready for them! Highly recommended for anyone wanting to get professional looking.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Worthless... avoid at all costs
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a zero star option. I just took this product out of the box to discover it is one of the most poorly designed things I’ve ever bought. The quality of construction is pitiful. The drawer is crooked and not even the proper shape. The middle section is literally on an angle, all of the dividers are crooked. It looks like someone beat it with a hammer yet the box is in perfect condition..I will for sure be getting a refund for this. I’ve literally seen ones at a dollar store that looked like the manufacture cared more than these guys. Save your money and time and go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Kane

customer_reviews.title: Not able to hold full size notebooks or folders
customer_reviews.text: Not as described in that you cannot put full size notebooks or folders in the area shown in the photos. It is super small and can only accommodate the small bound notebooks. I bought it based off the photos that made it appear that standard folders can be placed in them but not even close. I wanted a caddy where I could get my notebooks off my desk and organized. Still debating if we have use for it or just return it and get a larger one. I think it will be the latter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good desk organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy having this on my desk. It holds my important papers and books. I can easily access my papers and small desk items. I use the small little areas for paper clips and pins for my cork board. I now have a spot for my pens and sharpies and pencils. I like this product and it has held up well to time and desk abuse. It is sturdy and does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bates

customer_reviews.title: Product came as described!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife’s home office. It’s a pretty simple little organizer. She uses the back part as an I-pad and headphone holder and it works great! The small square drawer is great for sticky note pads. I recommend the silver model if you want to spice things up a bit. As for the quality it seems light weight, yet sturdy. No negatives I can think of!
customer_reviews.author: Mason W

customer_reviews.title: Love this desk organizer
customer_reviews.text: I am familiar with these wire storage caddies working in an office and ordering for my offices. I have to say that I like this one better than any I have at work. The storage is exceptional and the way it compartmentalizes is great. It is very sturdy and should last indefinitely. May need to buy my own for work!
customer_reviews.author: Jesslz

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The product was way too small than I expected was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read carefully! Makeup organizer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a make up organizer. Don’t go based on the picture, that was my mistake. I needed something that could hold a regular Manila folder or 2 pocket folders. They do not fit. It’s good for a few pens and post it’s but not if you’re truly organizing your desk and want easy access to a quick document.
customer_reviews.author: Damian R

customer_reviews.title: Nice organizer, wrong color
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice little organizer but I ordered silver and received black. Fortunately this was my first purchase for my office space so I just changed all my desk accessories to black goig fwd instead of the gray/silver color I preferred.
customer_reviews.author: Carie

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a great organizer. It fits nicely on my desk without taking up too much space and holds everything I need it to. The metal is pretty sturdy and it works well
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Watson

customer_reviews.title: A durable space saver
customer_reviews.text: This Desk Organizer fits perfectly on my small desk. It has quite a few compartments being so small. That would be my only suggestion, being so small, If just one compartment could have a removable divider so you could have 1 larger compartment instead of 2 smaller ones. As I said the size is perfect for my desk..
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Nord

customer_reviews.title: Nice, could be just a little larger
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice but afraid if too much it will pop somewhere along seams. Wait for update: tax headache: unavoidable gathering paperwork: monkeys will be the nightmare with their: 🙉🙈🙈🙊
customer_reviews.author: trekylucy

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the box I thought wow this is a lot smaller than i thought it was. But after opening it I realized it really is perfect size. IT is very functional for the home office and has an attractive color to it. I cannot complain at all
customer_reviews.author: J.Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent construction
customer_reviews.text: The construction is inconsistent. The first was fine. The second so crooked I returned. The third also had the divider welded crooked and the compartments irregular.
customer_reviews.author: GoldenGirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect organization tool
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I have it filled with notepaper, pens & pencils (& such), paper clips, white out, an eraser, and sticky tabs & post it notes. Really gives me a solid place to keep things organized.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Helmbold

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 8x11 papers
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to store some of my documents as well as other desk items and it does not fit 8.5"x11" papers. Otherwise good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Wiese

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, saves a lot of desk space!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Mindspace desk organizer. It is sturdy, offers ample storage space with a variety of different options, from drawers, bins and slots, and best yet, it has cleaned up my desk tremendously. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Organized, Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the overall look and functionality of this! It looks cute and organized in my cubical and I was SO excited to take it to the office! The only 2 things I wish could have been just a little different: The area in the back for papers or folders isn't quite as fit for full sheets of paper as it seems it should be. (Seems just a bit shy on the width.) And the small pull out drawer seems to stick a bit almost as if it sits just below the edge it is pulled across...Other than those 2 things, I absolutely love this product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: The product was smaller than I thought but if you plan on putting a couple things in it then it is great i still use it and love it
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Organize your Remote controllers
customer_reviews.text: Do you have remote controllers all over you coffee table? I did. I am sure this product is a great desk organizer but it also works well for all of those remote controllers that are cluttering your living room. Also have room for post it notes and some pens. Very convenient organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Burns

customer_reviews.title: She absolutely loved it. It fits all of the necessities without ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for a friend who had recently become a "boss" at her job. She absolutely loved it. It fits all of the necessities without being overwhelmingly big on her desk. The organizer is nice and sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Mae

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect to hold all the necessary accessories at our computer.
customer_reviews.text: This organizer fits in the small area that we have next to our computer and it holds pens, pencils, post-it notes, paper clips, etc. It is just perfect and well made. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and has placed her school supplies in the organizer already.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I needed for my new home office.
customer_reviews.text: It holds all the things I need for my desktop. I am short on space and it holds everything without taking up too much room. Very well made. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Moran

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Like the different compartments, just wish it was a bit bigger. Also would like better rubber grips on the bottom. Overall, nice quality - mesh metal is smooth, not warped like on some other products on the market and put together nicely.
customer_reviews.author: M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked high and low for a desk organizer but places like target, staples, and Walmart wanted double to triple the cost. I decided to order this and it was the best choice! It’s not cheaply made and provides extra storage for my office desk.
customer_reviews.author: Madrigal’s

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and tons of space
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old picked this out for her desk. She is an organized little girl. She loves her new desktop organizer and was able to fit so much of her pens, pencils, post-it’s etc in it. Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Durable, long lasting, and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second mindspace organizer I’ve purchased, and it wasn’t to replace the first. I decided I needed a bigger one for the work office and moved the old one to the home office. These organizers last forever, and hold up to pretty much everything. They’re easy to clean if office supplies explode or that clumsy coworker stops by and knocks over your coffee and covers it in mocha latte. It’s got plenty of space to keep everything you need neatly organized on your desk, and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kershaw

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Price incredibly high for the size of this product. I only kept it because the need for it outweighed the cost
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Product is slightly bent and the shelf above the pull ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is slightly bent and the shelf above the pull out drawer is installed so crookedly that it takes two hands to pull the drawer out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! Everything was packaged well and looked very nice. The container works perfectly for my desk needs!
customer_reviews.author: SDP

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Looks great with the rest of my daughters school stuff and helps keep her organized.
customer_reviews.author: Casey G

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to dimensions - a bit too small to carry full-size notebook.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly the kind of organizer I was looking for but it's just about 1/2" smaller in just about every compartment than I would like. I got fooled by the photo. I was hoping to put my organizer in the back slot but since it is slightly larger than paper size, it doesn't fit. And each of the other compartments is just a tiny bit too small to put more than one thing in it. However, I am making it work and it's nice to have less clutter. It was the ONLY organizer like it anywhere so I appreciate Mindspace for making it.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for small desk
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my little desk at home. It holds my notebooks, pens, sticky notes, etc. It's not big, it is rather small, but great for small desks.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Good size, sturdy quality, attractive and matches the picture/descriptions.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the purchase. It is a great size for most typical office desk supplies. It's a sturdy, strong metal and is attractive looking on my desk. The product match the pictures and descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for a small desk like mine although you should be aware of the dimensions since the back rack is not wide enough for the average notebook/folder but is great for small journals/small book calanders. The back rack was okay for me since I have shelves for mine but a lot of other people usually dont.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought and the space above the drawer is kinda wasted for me
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced but Useful
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition and seems to get the job done well in terms of storage space, but it truly is overpriced as you can find the same style of product at Target or Staples for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wren

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: This piece is really nice and sturdy. It won't tear like the cardboard organizer I replaced. It cleaned up my space nicely. I do wish the back space for papers was a little larger, but this was the best organizer I could find for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for bills, office supplies, and look
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I bought this to set up my office and it looks amazing on my new desk! There is room for my stapler, pens, post its, stamps, paper clips, white-out, calculator, and scissors. Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: KelliMarie

customer_reviews.title: Not for an office
customer_reviews.text: This item is microscopic. This is not for an office desk.
customer_reviews.author: RHam

customer_reviews.title: Picture misleading
customer_reviews.text: pay attention to measurements instead of what the picture says it holds. very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Balcazar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desk organising
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for organising. I ordered a few pieces to match and it all works very well together.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Ann Tucker

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Great size and designed intelligently you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sunther

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love how sturdy the desk organizer is. I got the silver but it’s matte and looks very good, not cheap at all. My only concern is that it’s small. Pieces of paper fit perfectly but a folder doesn’t. You’d think it it would be a little longer so that they’re could be space. Overall it’s good and I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kenia Macias

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product
customer_reviews.text: It is everything that it says that it is! I am enjoying it to the fullest. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Pam

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and nice size.
customer_reviews.text: This desk organizer is very well made. It's perfect for what I was looking for. I'd highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: For college student
customer_reviews.text: We will see how she likes it at school...looks pretty good though
customer_reviews.author: J G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Great organizer, perfect for my streamlined desk. Arrived quickly and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Mindspace means Greatspace!
customer_reviews.text: I use the drawer below the notepad section to hold my backup postits! Matches my other items Perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Stoudt

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small space at my desk but I think this organizer will do the trick
customer_reviews.author: Colame

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have asked for a more straightforward product. Love it as it sits on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Robert Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Make It Bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I really like my Mindspace Office Desk Organizer. I would like you to manufacture it in a larger size; not necessarily taller but longer.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Pearce

customer_reviews.title: This one's bent out of shape
customer_reviews.text: The one I got is bent so the drawer sticks and there's a gap at the bottom of it. It doen't sit flat on the glass desktop. Maybe I just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Great for makeup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Granddaughter to put on her vanity table for her makeup. She just loves it! The quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: This is SO helpful, compact but holds plenty!
customer_reviews.text: I use this and I have it next to me holding pens, scissors, envelope opener, tweezers, small flashlight. It also has a small drawer that holds a USB plug and other lil things. For me, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: good openings
customer_reviews.text: lots of nooks and crannies, works great with their other option.
customer_reviews.author: Sandro S

customer_reviews.title: It’s the perfect size for my nightstand
customer_reviews.text: I really like this organizer. I use it on my night stand for odds and ends. It’s small but works really well for the limited space. I feel better being organized :-)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Castor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for College Dorms!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my desk at college and love it! Its perfect for storage of school supplies and looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Good for what it is but far too small. Might be nice for a home office to put small odds and ends and envelopes in, but definitely not suited for a work office. Won't even fit a manila folder.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla K Burt

customer_reviews.title: Helps organize school lockers
customer_reviews.text: The size and the compartments make it a nice addition to our child's school locker. It helps him keep all those small things from getting lost behind the books, papers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Tegethoff

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Simple
customer_reviews.text: Great for small space organization for your home and or office
customer_reviews.author: J Trejo

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect on my desk and holds everything I need it to!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Office desk organizer
customer_reviews.text: A great item to hold all your little things in one place!
customer_reviews.author: Jaggers

customer_reviews.title: The Mindspace office desk organizer is a good organizer for small items.
customer_reviews.text: The Mindspace office desk organizer is the perfect size to hold the accessories that were scattered upon the desk. This organizer allows for more valuable workspace. The desk organizer had some minor flaws but overall it is attractive and appears to be durable. The desk organizer is made of metal and I really like the silver. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christoph P. Clucas

customer_reviews.title: This is smaller than the picture but if your not ...
customer_reviews.text: This is smaller than the picture but if your not trying to take up a lot of space but need something to fit all your desk supply in this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very useful
customer_reviews.text: This product fits exactly what I was looking for, very utilitarian with enough space for lots of stuff. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Loopstra

customer_reviews.title: Good desk organizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son’s desk ,it looks very nice and he can put everything he needs for virtual clases for now !
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, holds everything!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I was looking for an organizer for my desk that holds everything to include my post it notes! A must!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Knoles

customer_reviews.title: looks cool and nice convenient compartments
customer_reviews.text: Same as the headline, friends. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted all new organizer for her new desk, and she picked this one out and loves it. It looks very nice on her desk and she was able to fit numerous items into the organizer. Looks nice on her dark brown desk.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Bukowski

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Would recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to organize my home office desk! Love it. Would recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: J. M. C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, useful.
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer:) neatly organizes my stuff and I like the design! very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Park

customer_reviews.title: Good Organizer For Dorm Room Student
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son who is going to college as a freshman. I filled it with items and wrapped it so that it would be ready for dorm room life! He really found it helpful.
customer_reviews.author: MurphyAbby

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my sister for Christmas! She loves it! Super fast delivery, and great contact with the manufacturer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great for at home office
customer_reviews.text: This is great for at home office. One more small compartment would be great but that's what makes it compact.
customer_reviews.author: jimp.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: It is really a good product, but I am disappointed I ordered the silver color and I get the black one. I do not understand why if you choose a color when you are buying it, you will receive any one ?
customer_reviews.author: Camila

customer_reviews.title: This is Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This saved me so much room on my nightstand. I still have some room left for some more storage. It organises very well with my stuff in it. I do not have a camera on me at the moment of this review but this item is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Mindspace Office Desk Organizer
customer_reviews.text: small and compact, fits in the small desk area in my kitchen. It has enough compartments to store everything I need to be out and at hand for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home office.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what it is. Would recommend again. Nice and sturdy build.
customer_reviews.author: Constantinos Mitoulis

customer_reviews.title: High Quality for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is compact yet roomy enough for my needs. Extremely sturdy and well constructed. Price is excellent and it shipped quickly. I am sure I'll be using more Mindscape products!
customer_reviews.author: MrsLady3

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: It’s smaller than the picture a folder doesn’t fit on back compartment and I clearly ordered a grey one the send me a black one.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service and delivery! Disappointed in size.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the size of this organizer. I thought it was a lot bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wable

customer_reviews.title: Really well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this help clean up my wife's computer desk and she loved it. It looks good, has a smart assortment of compartments, and is surprisingly well made. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Waterman

customer_reviews.title: Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Afraid it might not hold up. Light weight. Got got my granddaughter to take to college and she is pleased.
customer_reviews.author: beverly S

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product idea, however , the organizer came scrapped up as if it was used before.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne m.

customer_reviews.title: Great desk organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful compact desk organizer. I am a teacher and it holds everything I need- sticky notes, paperclips, pens, pencils, scissors etc.... It is actually a little smaller than I thought it was, which turns out to be good. I don't need anything bigger. I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rapchik-Levin

customer_reviews.title: Wonky!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived really wonky and with a random strand of metal wire. If this is normal, don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Richard B

customer_reviews.title: DESK ORGANIZER
customer_reviews.text: It's compact & doesn't take up too much space on my computer desk. It's made well but wish I'd ordered a little bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gosh I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh I love this thing. It helped my OCD so much! My little office aupplies nook now has a home for everything in it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It hold a lot!
customer_reviews.text: This holds a lot of stuff. Great for note cards, paper clips, sticker notes, pens, and highlighters.
customer_reviews.author: Hooghanlani

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality. each compartment and has just enough space for daily used items. The drawer is super cute too.
customer_reviews.author: fernando

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect 👌! Just what I needed to have ALL my writing implements close at hand
customer_reviews.author: Shala Raby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's a little smaller than I imagined but it's very good quality and looks perfect on my desk
customer_reviews.author: Jade Kenna

customer_reviews.title: good fit
customer_reviews.text: It fit the spot on my desk and holds the things I need to help organize my desk
customer_reviews.author: Glen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Comes assembled and ready to go!
customer_reviews.text: Great desk organizer for my things. Though it can't carry everything, It definitely helped with clutter. Thanks mindspace!
customer_reviews.author: xikukrqzqbo

product_meta.title: Mindspace Office Desk Organizer with 6 Compartments + Drawer + Pen & Pencil Holder | The Mesh Collection, Silver
feature_bullets: ▶ ENOUGH SPACE FOR EVERYTHING. Desktop Organizer with 6 compartments of well-thought out dimensions that will keep the stuff you need at hand, while staying out of your way.
▶ EASY ACCESS THAT MOVES WITH YOU. Our desk organizer’s pull out drawer slides out smoothly and goes right back easily for expandable storage that’s right there when you need it.
▶ THE LIGHTWEIGHT HEAVYWEIGHT. Made of sturdy, mesh metal and a solid metal base, this one’ll take all the pens and rulers you can throw at it, while being none the worse for wear.
▶ LOOKS GREAT ON YOUR DESK. A smooth ABS coating feels great to the touch, while the smooth, rounded edges and trim add to the visual appeal. Four soft rubber grips protect your desk
